solution_line_template: Kyro owes Fernanda half of what Aryan owes Fernanda, a total of {half_fraction} *${aryan_debt} = ${kyro_debt}<<{half_fraction}*{aryan_debt}={kyro_debt}>>{kyro_debt}
Aryan pays {aryan_payment_percentage} of her dept, which equals {aryan_payment_percentage}*{aryan_debt} = ${aryan_payment}<<{aryan_payment_percentage}*{aryan_debt}={aryan_payment}>>{aryan_payment}

If Fernanda adds the amount she's been paid by Aryan to her savings account, it increases to ${initial_savings}+${aryan_payment} = ${savings_after_aryan_payment}<<{initial_savings}+{aryan_payment}={savings_after_aryan_payment}>>{savings_after_aryan_payment}
Kyro also pays her debt by {kyro_payment_percentage}*${kyro_debt} = ${kyro_payment}<<{kyro_payment_percentage}*{kyro_debt}={kyro_payment}>>{kyro_payment}

When Fernanda adds the amount she's been paid by Kyro to her savings account, the total amount of money in the savings account increases to ${savings_after_aryan_payment}+${kyro_payment} = ${final_savings}<<{savings_after_aryan_payment}+{kyro_payment}={final_savings}>>{final_savings}
